text: This is a list of cities and towns in Burkina Faso. ==10 largest cities== City Population (Census 2006)National 2006 census preliminary results Ouagadougou 1,181,702 Bobo Dioulasso 435,543 Koudougou 82,720 Banfora 72,144 Ouahigouya 70,957 Kaya 25,880 Tenkodogo 40,839 Fada N'gourma 40,815 Dédougou 37,793 Houndé 34,669 == References == Burkina Faso Category:Geography of Burkina Faso
